participant_1.background:
My dogs are my best friends and I want to learn how to be a better dog owner.
i m almost finished with my degree.
I don't mind the rain, because it helps me drown out my terrible singing voice.
I am a writer, and I use my solitude to my creative advantage.
I just got back from a walk with my dog, and I'm looking forward to teaching her some new tricks!

participant_2.background:
I have never been arrested, but I have had my fair share of close calls.
I love spending time with my family and bingeing on Netflix.
My dad is a chef and my sister is a server, so my favorite food is always on the table.
I'm going to drive my old car to the orchard and pick apples.
I loved reading books from the bookstore with my mom when I was a kid.

content.text: What is your favorite way to spend a rainy day?
I love to binge watch tv shows with my family. What do you like to do?
I love to write, but when it rains I like to take my dog for a walk and then work on some new dog training tricks.
That sounds like a great way to spend a rainy day! I wish I had a dog, but my cat would probably be too jealous.
Haha, yeah that would be a problem. What kind of cat do you have?
She's a tabby named Mittens. She's a sweet cat, but she's also very independent.
Sounds like a great cat! I have two dogs, a German Shepherd named Rex and a Labrador Retriever named Luna.
Aww, that sounds like a lot of fun! I've never had a dog before, but I've always wanted one.
They're definitely a lot of work, but they're also a lot of fun. They're the best companions you could ask for.
I'm sure they are! I'll have to keep that in mind the next time I'm looking for a pet.
Awesome! I'm sure you'll find a great pet for you.
